pages.text: $(li)The Fermented Spider Eye is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/weakness)Potion of Weakness$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft $(l)Magic Beans$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
